languages.text: Attacks against targets suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} apply the toxin effect with the same power to all enemies within a 2-cell radius of the target.

traits.locale_text: Attacks against targets suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} apply the toxin {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effect{/g} with the same power to all enemies within a 2-cell radius of the target.
Attacks against targets suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} apply the toxin effect with the same power to all enemies within a 2-cell radius of the target.

languages.text: 攻击受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果影响的目标时，会对目标周围2格内所有敌人施加同等强度的毒素效果。
languages.original_text: Attacks against targets suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} apply the toxin effect with the same power to all enemies within a 2-cell radius of the target.

traits.locale_text: 攻击受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}效果{/g}影响的目标时，会对目标周围2格内所有敌人施加同等强度的毒素效果。

languages.text: При атаке цели, на которую наложено {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, этот эффект той же силы накладывается на других противников в радиусе 2 клеток от цели.
languages.original_text: Attacks against targets suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} apply the toxin effect with the same power to all enemies within a 2-cell radius of the target.

traits.locale_text: При атаке цели, на которую наложено {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, этот {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}эффект{/g} той же силы накладывается на других противников в радиусе 2 клеток от цели.

При атаке цели, на которую наложено {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, этот {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}эффект{/g} той же силы накладывается на других противников в радиусе 2 клеток от цели.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}を受けたターゲットへの攻撃は、ターゲットの周囲2セル以内の全ての敵に同じ強さの毒素効果を適用する。
languages.original_text: Attacks against targets suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} apply the toxin effect with the same power to all enemies within a 2-cell radius of the target.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}を受けたターゲットへの攻撃は、ターゲットの周囲2セル以内の全ての敵に同じ強さの毒素{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}効果{/g}を適用する。

languages.text: Los ataques contra objetivos afectados por {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} aplican el efecto toxina con la misma potencia a todos los enemigos en un radio de 2 casillas del objetivo.
languages.original_text: Attacks against targets suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} apply the toxin effect with the same power to all enemies within a 2-cell radius of the target.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques contra objetivos afectados por {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} aplican el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto{/g} toxina con la misma potencia a todos los enemigos en un radio de 2 casillas del objetivo.

languages.text: Angriffe gegen Ziele, die unter {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} leiden, verursachen bei allen Feinden in einem 2-Zellen-Radius des Ziels den Gift-Effekt mit derselben Kraft.
languages.original_text: Attacks against targets suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} apply the toxin effect with the same power to all enemies within a 2-cell radius of the target.

traits.locale_text: Angriffe gegen Ziele, die unter {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} leiden, verursachen bei allen Feinden in einem 2-Zellen-Radius des Ziels den Gift-{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}Effekt{/g} mit derselben Kraft.

languages.text: Les attaques contre une cible frappée par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} appliquent ce même effet avec la même puissance à tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de cette cible.
languages.original_text: Attacks against targets suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} apply the toxin effect with the same power to all enemies within a 2-cell radius of the target.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques contre une cible frappée par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} appliquent ce même {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet{/g} avec la même puissance à tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de cette cible.
